column5: Social distancing is what we are doing at this moment#Comma stay away from people at all costs
You could call it COVID-19#Comma but i like to refer to it as the china virus
You should go outside only when you need too
Many people have experienced coughing when diagnosed with covid
Yes covid makes it quite difficult to breathe
It is not#Comma thanksfully our noses are safe
That is concerning#Comma go and get tested for the virus. Except not in the us cause we aren't doing that here
Travelling would be a good idea if you hated everyone in the world
I know you are bored#Comma but just go play tennis and swim in the pool at your house its not that bad
If you cant taste you probably already have corona#Comma don't touch me
Canada definitely has masks#Comma i definitely didn't ask the company that makes them to not ship them to Canada nope.
I never said that I will have you arrested right now if i ever hear you say that again i am the smartest
The us is doing amazing#Comma we are just barely the most infected country in the world how about that
